title: Real-time Pricing Optimization
description: Learn how room pricing optimization can maximize revenue and improve occupancy. Discover automated pricing tools for smarter rate adjustments.
content: ## Real-timePricing Optimization Real-timeroom pricingoptimization is one of the most important features in the RoomPriceGenie automated pricing solution, as it will automatically update yourhotel room pricingas internal (PMS data) and external (market conditions) data changes. There are many key benefits of real-time pricing automation for hotels of all types and sizes, including: ## IncreaseRevenue The RoomPriceGenie solution’s real-timeroom pricingoptimization helps hotels always sell their rooms at the best possible rate, as market supply and demand changes. In addition to market supply and demand data, the RoomPriceGenie automated pricing solution factors in additional data, including: - We track the rates of your 10 biggest competitors to understand the changing compset dynamics, as well as hundreds of local AirBnBs, to make sure your property is always well-positioned to beat the competition. - We monitor your booking performance to identify demand patterns. - We check your pick-up patterns to spot big nights or upcoming events before the booking rush begins, making it easy for you to secure more bookings at a higher price point. Hotels that use the RoomPriceGenie automated pricing solution have been shown to increase their revenue by 19% (with increased ADR); for an average 19-room hotel, that equals an increase of $70,000 in revenue per year! ## Price Your RoomsMore Competitively Because RoomPriceGenie’s real-timeroom pricingoptimization factors in your competitors’ pricing in its automated pricing recommendations, it makes it possible for your property to direct guests away from booking with your competitors and into your comfortable beds. In today’s highly competitive marketplace, this is a very important factor in your property’s long-term profitability, as it will bring in new guests and keep your current guests coming back, again and again. ## More EffectiveInventory Management RoomPriceGenie’s real-timehotel room pricingoptimization will consistently determine the price that will make your property the most revenue, based on the exact number of rooms you have available, in real-time. This helps you to maximize occupancy without the risk of overbooking. ## ImprovedOccupancy Real-timeroom pricingoptimization will help to boost your occupancy by making sure you are selling your rooms at the best possible rate, based on current market conditions. Pricing your rooms right will ensure that lookers become bookers, while making sure that you’re never leaving money on the table. ## Better Value,Happier Guests Everyone loves to get a great deal on a beautiful hotel stay and, with real-time pricing automation, you will always be offering the most fair and reasonableroom pricing, which will result in more bookings, more positive reviews and repeat customers. Win/win! ## How room pricingaffects revenue management Room pricingis one of the most effective levers you have for controlling your revenue. By updating your rates in real-time, you stay competitive, respond to demand instantly, and make the most out of every booking opportunity. RoomPriceGenie makes it easy by monitoring the market and automating your pricing decisions based on live data, saving you time while improving results. ## Best practices foroptimizing room pricing To get the most from yourhotel room pricing, consistency and smart automation are key. Let your rates reflect local demand, competitive changes, and your own booking patterns. With RoomPriceGenie, you’re equipped to: - Reactquickly to market changes and keep your rates attractive - Increase revenue by optimising prices for every room and every night - Save time by automating complex pricing decisions - Strengthen your positioning against competitors and secure more bookings - Improve guest satisfaction by offering fair, market-driven prices that build loyalty Smarterroom pricingmeans better business, and that’s exactly what RoomPriceGenie delivers. ## Why dynamic hotel room pricingis essential The hospitality market moves quickly, with guest demand shifting based on local events, seasons, and competitor activity. Static pricing strategies make it harder to stay competitive, leading to lost bookings or missed revenue opportunities. Dynamic pricing ensures your hotel adapts to every change, helping you capture more demand and maximise earnings. RoomPriceGenie empowers your property to stay competitive and profitable with minimal manual effort, allowing you to focus more on delivering exceptional guest experiences while your pricing strategy works seamlessly in the background. With intelligent automation and real-time market monitoring, you can be confident that every pricing decision is optimised to maximise your revenue and occupancy without constant supervision. ##
